abstract: Poland announces experts are working to get inside armored train that officials are almost certain was used by Nazis to transport guns and jewelry; train went missing near end of World War II.
lead_paragraph: Poland said Friday that it was almost certain that it had located a Nazi train rumored to have gone missing near the end of World War II loaded with guns and jewels.

headline.main: Poland: New Hints About a Train Filled with Treasure
headline.print_headline: Poland: New Hints About a Train

snippet: Poland said Friday that it was almost certain that it had located a Nazi train rumored to have gone missing near the end of World War II loaded with guns and jewels.
